title: Britain's best family saloons tested: we reveal the strengths and flaws of the leading models
text:
Premium saloons. Desirable, practical, powerful… German.

We Brits can't get enough of them, judging by how many BMWs, Mercedes and Audis are on our roads. But how do you know which one is right for you and your family?

On paper the compact executive class is a tough one to call, made even harder by Jaguar and Volvo massively upping their game recently. It isn’t until you drive them all in the “real world” that you get a proper sense of how they all compare.

So we tested five of the latest marque sports saloons - the new 3 Series, C-Class, XE, A4 and S60 - and threw everything we could at them over several weeks (kids, golf clubs, shopping bags, and potholes) to find their major strength as well...
